LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Light_I.label: Energy Shield - Fluorescence
LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Light_I.description: The first game of the Divine Light Energy Shield has a low energy cap and recovery speed, loaded with a resident energy guardian, which has a chance to reduce the damage taken when the shield is broken, this is a long-range specialized shield, which will reduce less energy when taking long-range damage
LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Light_II.label: Energy Shield - Daylight
LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Light_II.description: The second game of the Divine Light Energy Shield, with a medium energy cap and recovery speed, is loaded with a resident energy guardian that has a chance to reduce the damage taken when the shield is broken, and this is a long-range specialized shield that reduces less energy when taking long-range damage
